item.title: How to implement Virtualized Grid/List in React
item.description: Around 2018, one of my colleague was working on creating a list component which only renders a limited amount of items in the list instead of the whole one to improve the performance if the list is in large or huge scale. I was always interested at how he did that, but I did not do any investment, just an idea. Then once I was asked how to implement such thing during an interview, it remindered me.
